Today I chose PR 7079 for discussion!

fix(*): theorem to lemma
Created by @damiano (@adomani) on 2023-09-10
Labels: awaiting-review, merge-conflict

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

This one is on hold: the poll had a majority of votes in favour, but also a good amount of people against it. I am not too happy with the current lemma/theorem situation, and I would prefer a solution that has a higher proportion of people in favour.

There are some maintainer discussions ongoing; the summary is that if we do go ahead with this, we want to have the strict theorem command ready to enable as soon as you make the replacement, so that we don't have to do multiple rounds of replacement as other PRs are merged
Ok, great! The "syntax processing" questions that I have been asking are partly aimed at this as well
(although I don't have anything concrete and I'm not sure how to deal with auto-generated lemmas)
